Package au.edu.sydney.hecfor.erp.product

Interface Product

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ProductImpl
    public interface Product
    This class is a record of a type of Product that can be stored by the system.

      void setApprovalStatus​(java.lang.String approvalStatus, boolean finalised)

    • Method Detail

      • setApprovalStatus

        void setApprovalStatus​(java.lang.String approvalStatus,
                       boolean finalised)
                throws java.lang.IllegalStateException,
                       java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Sets this Product object to a new approval status. Approval statuses are simple String objects. Some approval statuses are marked as 'finalised' and cannot be changed further.

        Preconditions:
        The Product must not have had a 'finalised' approval status set previously.
        Postconditions:
        The Product will be set to the given approval status. If the finalised parameter is true it will be marked as final and no further updates may be made.
        Parameters:
        approvalStatus - The approval status to assign. May not be empty or null.
        finalised - Whether this is a final step in the approval process
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If this product has already been assigned to a final approval status.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If any argument requirements are breached

      • approvalFinalised

        boolean approvalFinalised()
        Simple accessor for product approval finalised status.

        Preconditions:
        None
        Postconditions:
        None
        Returns:
        True if the product has been assigned to a final approval status, otherwise false.

      • getApprovalStatus

        java.lang.String getApprovalStatus()
        Simple accessor for product assigned approval status

        Preconditions:
        None
        Postconditions:
        None
        Returns:
        The approval status the product has been assigned to. Will be null if no approval status has been set.
